marker.ph: /// Role: BOMBERMAN - countdown when the bomb explodes. ...
/// Role: BOMBERMAN - distance of bomb's explosion. ...
/// Role: BOMBERMAN - bomb max deploy count. ...
/// Role: BOMBERMAN - Time to respawn the character. ...
/// Static instance of GameManager which allows it to be accessed by any other script. ...
/// Game mode if it is local game or online game, etc. ...
/// The number of rounds a single player has to win to win the game. ...
/// The delay between the start of RoundStarting and RoundPlaying phases. ...
/// // The delay between the end of RoundPlaying and RoundEnding phases. ...
/// Reference to the CameraControl script for control during different phases. ...
/// Reference to the prefab the players will control. ...
/// A collection of managers for enabling and disabling different aspects of the tanks. ...
/// Which round the game is currently on. ...
/// Used to have a delay whilst the round starts. ...
/// Used to have a delay whilst the round or game ends. ...
/// Reference to the winner of the current round. Used to make an announcement of who won. ...
/// Reference to the winner of the game. Used to make an announcement of who won. ...
/* Sets this to not be destroyed when reloading scene. ... */
/* Once the players have been created and the camera is using them as targets, start the game. ... */
/// Spawn all players with choosen role. ...
/// Set all camera targets which camera should follow. ...
/// This class is able to manipulate with the main camera. ...
/// This class controlls all possible spawn on the map. ...
/// Static instance of SpawnManager which allows it to be accessed by any other script. ...
/* Sets this to not be destroyed when reloading scene. ... */
/// This class is to manage various settings on a player. ...
/// This is the color this tank will be tinted. ...
/// A reference to the instance of the tank when it is created. ...
/// The number of wins this player has so far. ...
/// Pass all necessary parameters to Player scripts (like hotkeys etc.). ...
/// Used during the phases of the game where the player shouldn't be able to control their character. ...
/// Used during the phases of the game where the player should be able to control their character. ...
/// Used at the start of each round to put the character into it's default state. ...
/// This class works with map tiles and launches events like explosions in the map. ...
/// Static instance of MapManager which allows it to be accessed by any other script. ...
/// List of all possible player spawn positions. ...
/// Make explosion in the current cell (by world position pointing to the cell.) ...
/// Range when the bomb become collidable after placing it on the ground. ...
/// This class defines the basics of all characters in the game. ...
/// Used to identify which tank belongs to which player. ...
/// A reference to the character's animator. ...
/// Is character invulnerable thanks to some effect? ...
/// Check if the character is already death or not. ...
/// Tells if character can respawn after death. ...
/// Set if character can move and interact with other characters. ...
/// Immediately kills the character without any reason. ...
/// Maximal number of deployed bombs at the same time. ...
/// Explosion direction represented as array filled with X, Y coords representing the direction. ...
/// Lets say which section of player controls the character should use. ...
/// Place the bomb on the correct position. ...
/// Immediately kills the character without any reason. ...
